glsa.title: OptiPNG: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OptiPNG, the worst of which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: OptiPNG is a PNG optimizer that recompresses image files to a smaller size, without losing any information.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OptiPNG. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted image file resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
